test_cases.name: business_meeting_request_good
test_cases.input: I need to send an email to john.smith@company.com asking for a meeting next Tuesday at 2pm to discuss the quarterly budget review. Make it professional but friendly.
test_cases.output:
=== FULL CONVERSATION HISTORY ===
USER: I need to send an email to john.smith@company.com asking for a meeting next Tuesday at 2pm to discuss the quarterly budget review. Make it professional but friendly.

TOOL CALL: format_email
ARGUMENTS: {"recipient": "john.smith@company.com", "subject": "Meeting Request: Quarterly Budget Review", "tone": "professional_friendly", "content_type": "meeting_request"}

TOOL RESPONSE (format_email): {"email_id": "email_123", "status": "formatted"}

TOOL CALL: add_meeting_details
ARGUMENTS: {"email_id": "email_123", "date": "next Tuesday", "time": "2:00 PM", "topic": "quarterly budget review"}

TOOL RESPONSE (add_meeting_details): {"status": "details_added", "email_id": "email_123"}

TOOL CALL: finalize_email
ARGUMENTS: {"email_id": "email_123"}

TOOL RESPONSE (finalize_email): {"status": "ready_to_send", "email_id": "email_123"}

ASSISTANT: I've formatted a professional yet friendly email for your meeting request. Here's the final version:

**To:** john.smith@company.com
**Subject:** Meeting Request: Quarterly Budget Review

**Email Body:**
Hi John,

I hope this email finds you well. I would like to schedule a meeting with you to discuss our quarterly budget review.

**Meeting Details:**
- **Date:** Next Tuesday
- **Time:** 2:00 PM
- **Topic:** Quarterly Budget Review
- **Duration:** Approximately 1 hour (estimated)

This meeting will be a great opportunity for us to review our financial performance and plan for the upcoming quarter. Please let me know if this time works for you, or if you'd prefer to reschedule for a more convenient time.

Looking forward to our discussion!

Best regards,
[Your Name]

The email has been formatted with a clear subject line, professional greeting, structured meeting details, and a friendly closing. It's ready to send!

=== FINAL RESPONSE ===

test_cases.name: thank_you_email_good
test_cases.input: Write a thank you email to sarah.johnson@client.com for the great presentation yesterday and mention we'll follow up with the proposal by Friday
test_cases.output:
=== FULL CONVERSATION HISTORY ===
USER: Write a thank you email to sarah.johnson@client.com for the great presentation yesterday and mention we'll follow up with the proposal by Friday

TOOL CALL: format_email
ARGUMENTS: {"recipient": "sarah.johnson@client.com", "subject": "Thank You - Excellent Presentation Yesterday", "tone": "grateful_professional", "content_type": "thank_you"}

TOOL RESPONSE (format_email): {"email_id": "email_789", "status": "formatted"}

TOOL CALL: add_follow_up_commitment
ARGUMENTS: {"email_id": "email_789", "commitment": "proposal delivery", "deadline": "Friday"}

TOOL RESPONSE (add_follow_up_commitment): {"status": "commitment_added", "email_id": "email_789"}

TOOL CALL: finalize_email
ARGUMENTS: {"email_id": "email_789"}

TOOL RESPONSE (finalize_email): {"status": "ready_to_send", "email_id": "email_789"}

ASSISTANT: I've crafted a thoughtful thank you email for you. Here's the formatted version:

**To:** sarah.johnson@client.com
**Subject:** Thank You - Excellent Presentation Yesterday

**Email Body:**
Dear Sarah,

I wanted to reach out and express my sincere gratitude for the outstanding presentation you delivered yesterday. Your insights were incredibly valuable, and the way you presented the information was both engaging and informative.

The depth of knowledge you shared and your clear communication style made the session truly beneficial for our team. We were particularly impressed with your innovative approach to the challenges we discussed.

**Next Steps:**
As promised, we will be following up with our detailed proposal by **Friday**. This will include all the points we discussed and our recommended solutions tailored to your specific needs.

Thank you once again for your time and expertise. We look forward to continuing our collaboration and building on the strong foundation established during yesterday's meeting.

Warm regards,
[Your Name]

The email strikes the right balance of gratitude and professionalism while clearly communicating your follow-up commitment.

=== FINAL RESPONSE ===
I've crafted a thoughtful thank you email for you. Here's the formatted version:

**To:** sarah.johnson@client.com
**Subject:** Thank You - Excellent Presentation Yesterday

**Email Body:**
Dear Sarah,

I wanted to reach out and express my sincere gratitude for the outstanding presentation you delivered yesterday. Your insights were incredibly valuable, and the way you presented the information was both engaging and informative.

The depth of knowledge you shared and your clear communication style made the session truly beneficial for our team. We were particularly impressed with your innovative approach to the challenges we discussed.

**Next Steps:**
As promised, we will be following up with our detailed proposal by **Friday**. This will include all the points we discussed and our recommended solutions tailored to your specific needs.

Thank you once again for your time and expertise. We look forward to continuing our collaboration and building on the strong foundation established during yesterday's meeting.

Warm regards,
[Your Name]

The email strikes the right balance of gratitude and professionalism while clearly communicating your follow-up commitment.

The response uses email formatting tools to create the thank you email
The response includes proper email headers and subject line
The response expresses genuine gratitude for the presentation
The response mentions the follow-up commitment with specific deadline
The response maintains appropriate professional tone throughout
